daily_activities: Visiting the Museo Correr in Venice
Dining at a traditional Italian restaurant in the evening
Adventure sports in Lake Como (kayaking or paddleboarding)
Sightseeing in Rome (Colosseum, Roman Forum, Pantheon)
Dining at a rooftop restaurant with a view of the city
Visiting the National Archaeological Museum in Naples
Adventure sports in Tuscany (cycling or horseback riding)
Wine tasting in a local vineyard
Sightseeing in Florence (Duomo, Uffizi Gallery, Ponte Vecchio)
Visiting the Accademia Gallery to see Michelangelo's David

travel_instructions.estimated_travel_time: approximately 10 hours and 30 minutes to 12 hours, depending on the route and layovers
travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport (AMD) to one of Italy's major airports, such as Rome's Leonardo da Vinci–Fiumicino Airport (FCO) or Milan's Malpensa Airport (MXP), with possible layovers in cities like Dubai, Istanbul, or Frankfurt.
